output: html_document
runtime: shiny
---

```{r echo=FALSE}

# 1. setup
library(oce)
dir <- "~/data/arctic/beaufort/2012"
files <- list.files(dir, ".cnv")

# 2. define GUI
selectInput(inputId="file",
    label=sprintf("Select CNV file within %s", dir),
    choices=files)

# 3. react to GUI
renderPlot(
    {
        d <- read.oce(paste0(dir, "/", input$file))
        plot(d)
    },
    height=600, pointsize=18)

```
